resources.string:
> In Mole Seeker, your objective is to find all the moles hidden in the field.

> Clicking on a cell will trigger a scan; if that cell doesn't happen to have a mole hiding underneath it, the number of moles hiding in the area of the same column and row as that tile will be displayed on that tile.

> Your goal is to find all the moles using the least number of scans!!!

Kevin San Gabriel is a 3rd year undergraduate Computer Science student. Mole Seeker was developed by Kevin San Gabriel with courtesy to Dr. Brian Fraser and the class he teaches at Simon Fraser University called CMPT 276.
